title: Reading in the tavern image on education

content.description: The next questionÂ refers to the 1876 British image below.
content.question: The activities depicted in the image are best explained by which of the following?

choices.label: The development of public and charitable education
The increase in specialized industrial labor
The efforts by socialists to educate the poor
The decline in regional dialects and language variations

content.answer: The development of public and charitable education

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
